description:
The ghost that suddenly appeared on the ship is Masaki`s astral body.
After Jovia creates her body, Masaki leaves to check on her tree`s grafting.
With the island`s formation ongoing, 
Seina suggests that Tsukiko spends time in Kamidake`s magic unit...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 天地 騒造[そうぞう]
